Job Title: Environmental Lab Tech

Location: East Liverpool, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
Job#: 2023075

Job Description:

We are looking for Environmental Lab Technicians for IMMEDIATE HIRE in the environmental testing industry. This position is very hands-on and provides extensive training on all testing methods and instruments used on site.

Title: Lab Tech

Location: East Liverpool, OH

Pay: $22/hr

Length: Permanent

Schedule:

Week 1 Monday - Friday 6am - 230pm

Week 2 Thursday and Friday 2:30pm - 12am , Saturday and Sunday 9am - 9pm

Week 3 Tuesday - Friday 6am - 4pm

Week 4 Monday - Thursday 2pm - 12am

Week 5 Sunday - Wednesday 2pm - 12am

Summary:

Responsible for testing of both organic and inorganic environmental samples. This includes, but is not limited to, sample prep, running both wet chemistry testing, as well as analytical instrumentation testing.Receive reports from instrumentation and interpret results, as well as thoroughly document all testing results.Involved with calibration and preventative maintenance of instruments and lab equipment as well

Responsibilities:

Responsibilities will include wet chemistry bench testing, as well as bomb calorimetry and microwave digestion testing.Perform both organic and inorganic analytical testing, specifically IC, ICP, GC, GC-MS and TOC.Candidates will be given extensive analytical instrumentation training through a focused training program, though candidates must have at minimum an AS degree in the sciences. This is a fast paced lab processing a larger volume of samples per day, but testing can be repetitive. Following a number of specific SOPs related to testing methods and protocols.Sample prep and getting samples ready for processing, instrument calibration and preventative maintenance, loading analytical equipment and running various samples, reading instrument reports, etc.Evaluating testing data to determine any out of specification results.Interested candidates must be open to working both 1st and 2nd shift, as well as one weekend a month. Ensure safety is the number one goal by following policies, processes, and acting in a safe manner at all times.

Qualifications:

Minimum of BS in Chemistry, Biology, Physics or a closely related field.Ability to calculate figures and amounts, proportions, percentages, etc.Ability to work in a fast paced environmentStrong attention to details when following client created SOWs and working with results and documentationStrong organizational skills when working with lab results and putting together lab reportsEnsure laboratory and testing compliance at all times.Must be able to participate in multi-department teams.For immediate consideration please send an updated copy of your resume to Megan at [email protected] with “Lab Tech East Liverpool, Ohio” in the subject line**
